name: Bedtime is deadtime
description:
Gameplay

Fend off hordes of monsters that are trying to reach you in your sleep. Point your flashlight at enemies to dispel them.
This will fill up your Ultimate bar which can be used to create a circle of light that will kill all enemies in that area. The strength of this light depends on how much energy you have gathered. This will also restore some sanity for every enemy killed.

Enemies sometimes drop potions that will restore your sanity.

Controls
  • WSAD : Movement
  • SPACE : Ultimate
  • Mouse : Move flashlight
Enemy types Batibat

The Batibat is a demon from Ilocano folklore that takes the form of a huge, old, fat woman that resides in trees. Its goal is to suffocate people in their sleep by sitting on their chest.

This enemy will seek out the player and suffocate him.

The alp

The alp is a vampire from german folklore with shapeshifting abilities.

Once the player damages the alp to a certain point it will transform into a group of bats.

Pesanta

The Pesanta is an enormous dog from Catlan legend that suffocates people in their sleep.

It is quite a bit faster than other enemies.

Specter

The specter is a ghost that haunts dreams.

It can fly to its destination in a very short timeframe which makes it dangerous.

Demon Goose

The demon Goose haunts the player in his sleep.

This enemy type is quite average but it should not be ignored as these geese can easily overwhelm the player.
